text:
*[Bug 18968] One-char typo in NEWS.Rd*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18968>

Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |seb.meyer@fau.de
             Status|NEW                         |CLOSED
         Resolution|---                         |FIXED

--- Comment #4 from Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) ---
Thanks. The typo in \code would not have been spotted by the automatic spell
checks (but I saw it too). Fixed now by c89029 (and c89030 in the release
branch), together with other typos that I had noticed and fixed for a while in
my local "spelling" working copy.
